name: Ice Urchin
movement: walk 20 ft., doubles speed on snow or ice
description: The Ice Urchin is a large monstrosity with spiny features and an affinity for cold environments. Its icy body is covered in venomous spines that pose a threat to any who touch it.
memorable: Its notable vulnerability to fire can incapacitate it, making encounters with flames particularly impactful.
goals: The Ice Urchin typically thrives in icy terrain, where it can ambush prey while using its speed to evade threats.
relations: Likely found alongside other cold-loving creatures or in frigid oceans.
environment: Cold environments, specifically icy terrains and habitats.
strengths: Excels in icy terrain with increased movement and agility; capable of inflicting both piercing and cold damage.
weaknesses: Highly vulnerable to fire, which can frighten it and reduce its combat effectiveness.
attacks: Can deliver piercing and cold damage through its melee Ice Spine and ranged Venomous Spine attacks.
most_powerful_ability: The Ice Slide ability allows for rapid repositioning across snow and ice, making it a formidable skirmisher.
skills: It has average perception skills, making it capable but not skilled in noticing threats.
additional_information: Upon taking fire damage, it suffers a temporary reduction in both AC and attack effectiveness.
Can use its Fear of Fire ability to become frightened of fire-based threats.
Regrows venomous spines after resting, ensuring it can attack from range multiple times.
Can inflict damage on melee attackers via its Spiny Defense ability.
Possesses an effective Strength score, allowing it to perform solid physical attacks.
test_queries: large ice creature with quick movement
spiny ice monster that attacks from range
creature with increased speed on snow
